jdbcService.sql: insert into component_tag_group ( id, db_created_utc, db_modified_utc, min_occurs, max_occurs, component_id, tag_group_id, default_tag_id ) values ( :id, timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), :minOccurs, :maxOccurs, :componentId, :tagGroupId, :defaultTagId )
